title: Proposition Acceptance Details
description: A decision response is used to link an experience event that is a response to a prior decision/proposition events. Each decision output has a unique ID that can be echo'ed back with an experience event. The decision is assumed to have contributed to the experience event and is now attributed with by it.

xdm:items.title: Attributed Items
xdm:items.description: One or more of the items that this experience event is attributed to. Those items  were returned as results of the decision for a requested scope. For instance, if the decision returned five proposed videos to watch and the user selected two in a "Save For Later" action, then this experience event may record the user's reaction with an event type "custom.savedToWatchLater".

items.description: An item from the decision proposition's options. See 'selections' of the 'Decision Proposition Detail'.

xdm:decisionEventID.title: Decision Event Identifier
xdm:decisionEventID.description: The unique identifier of the decision event. For a given decision request and profile identity the output of the decision is a unique event. If a decision is requested again for the same profile and the output are the same options, it is still considered a different proposition with a unique propositionID. See https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decisioning/proposition.

xdm:decisionScope.title: Decision Event Scope
xdm:decisionScope.description: The scope that is associated with the decision's items reported in the 'xdm:selection' property. This is the same scope that was in effect when the decision was made that proposed the selected items.

xdm:decisionScopeDetails.title: Decision Event Scope Details
xdm:decisionScopeDetails.description: A snapshot of properties from the scope of the decision when it was made..
